node.title: First acts for next year’s line-up
New green records at Tøyen
node.excerpt: The recycling at this year´s festival saved us Co2 emissions that would amount to 13 000 cars a year.

node.title: Øya wins green awards!
node.excerpt: We are proud to announce that during the last weeks the Øyafestival has been gived two awards for our work with making the festival greener.

node.title: See you next year
node.excerpt: 2014: The best Øya Festival so far!

node.title: Future for the first time in Norway
node.excerpt: Hiphop sensation Future is coming to Scandinavia for the first time in August and will play Øya on the 7th of August.

node.title: Bryan Ferry at Øya Saturday 9th of August
node.excerpt: Bryan Ferry plays our main stage the same day as Todd Terje

node.title: Outkast will headline Øya on Thursday 7th of August
node.excerpt: We are extremely proud and delighted that they have chosen to stop by Tøyenparken on Thursday 7th of August, to give us a show filled with hits.

node.title: Mayhem’s 30th anniversary at Øya
node.excerpt: This spring Mayhem will release new music for the first time in seven years and in August they will play Øya.

node.title: Todd Terje to headline the Saturday
node.excerpt: As Todd Terje is a busy artist and DJ, the Øya Festival will be the only opportunity to see him play live in Norway this summer.

node.title: Students design for Øya
node.excerpt: This week, over 2000 students from across the globe will compete to design a new meeting point and icon for the Øya Festival.

messages.newsletter.consentLabel: I agree to the terms and conditions
messages.newsletter.consentText:
Øyafestivalen sender ut nyhetsbrev cirka 3-4 ganger per måned via
    e-post. Make AS er databehandler for nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen
    lagres i en egen database, deles ikke med andre og slettes når du
    sier opp abonnementet ved å melde deg av via lenken nederst i
    nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen slettes også om vi får tilbakemelding
    om at den ikke er aktiv.
